meanings.sent1: The housepainter arrived early in the morning to start painting the house.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired a housepainter to freshen up the exterior of their home.
meanings.sent3: The housepainter accidentally painted the mailbox the same color as the house!
meanings.sent4: The housepainter's brush danced across the walls like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The housepainter's overalls were splattered with colorful paint by the end of the day.

meanings.sent1: I will housepainter the entire exterior of the building next weekend.
meanings.sent2: She decided to housepainter her own home to save money.
meanings.sent3: Let's housepainter the town red with our new color scheme!
meanings.sent4: The artist housepaintered the canvas with bold strokes of color.
meanings.sent5: He housepaintered the walls with precision and care, leaving no spot untouched.
